This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=DDIG.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-23T12:46:50Z Clare Trott 2015-02-23T12:44:24+00:00 2015-02-23T12:44:24+00:00 one-day conference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DDIG;a20d2075.1502 REMINDER: BOOKING CLOSES 27th March2015<br><br>More Mist, Haze and Shutters<br>Wednesday 15th April 2015<br>Stewart Mason Building, Loughborough University<br><br>Following \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMist, Haze and Shutters: Dyscalculia in FE/HE\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd held at Loughborough University in April 2013, a similar one day conference will be held on Wednesday 15th April 2015. The focus will again be the FE/HE strand and the conference will explore mathematical learning difficulties associated with dyscalculia and other neurodiversities such as dyspraxia and dyslexia. My 10-year old (with signs of Dyscalculia but no services here in the<br>US) is doing a research project to raise awareness of Dyscalculia. Do you<br>know anyone in the states who might agree to a few questions in an<br>interview? [...] Clare Trott 2014-11-28T09:47:54+00:00 2014-11-28T09:47:54+00:00 Dyscalculia research - Request for expressions of interest https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DDIG;46f51ab1.1411 PLEASE REPLY DIRECT TO ELEANOR<br><br>Hi,<br><br>I'm an EdD student with the Open University, looking for anyone who would be interested in, or who might know of someone who is interested in, taking part in a research project on a Brain-Based intervention for college students with dyscalculia. This is a 'two-part' request: [...] Clare Trott 2014-11-24T09:38:06+00:00 2014-11-24T09:38:06+00:00 participants https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DDIG;35e36ae5.1411 PLEASE REPLY TO ISABELLE (not me or Colleen)<br>Hi<br>I hope it is ok to post this appeal for participants for research in dyscalculia. Isabelle has posted this on LinkedIn but is not a member of the forum. I thought some members may know of individuals who would like to participate, or may wish to do so themselves. If so please contact Isabelle directly on imgb20@bath.ac.uk<mailto:imgb20@bath.ac.uk><br>Best wishes [...] Clare Trott 2014-11-13T10:06:58+00:00 2014-11-13T10:06:58+00:00 REMINDER: one-day conference https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DDIG;68b4b5f1.1411 More Mist, Haze and Shutters<br>Wednesday 15th April 2015<br>Stewart Mason Building, Loughborough University<br><br>Following \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMist, Haze and Shutters: Dyscalculia in FE/HE\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd held at Loughborough University in April 2013, a similar one day conference will be held on Wednesday 15th April 2015. The focus will again be the FE/HE strand and the conference will explore mathematical learning difficulties associated with dyscalculia and other neurodiversities such as dyspraxia and dyslexia. The day is offered as a gentle introduction to the subject, exploring what is dyscalculia and issues that arise. Supporting the Dyscalculic Student in FE/HE<br><br>Booking closes Thursday Clare Trott 2014-05-07T08:55:44+00:00 2014-05-07T08:55:44+00:00 reminder 2 CPD days https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DDIG;e768052f.1405 Reminder<br><br>Two CPD days<br><br>* 1. Screening for Dyscalculia in FE/HE<br><br>* 2. Supporting the Dyscalculic Student in FE/HE<br><br>Booking closes 29th May Clare Trott 2014-04-27T11:56:43+00:00 2014-04-27T11:56:43+00:00 2 CPD days https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DDIG;b2081bb9.1404 You may be interested in the following CPD days in June:<br><br>Thursday 5th June - Screening for Dyscalculia in FE/HE<br><br>Thursday 12th June - Supporting the Dyscalculic Student in FE/HE<br><br>Booking and further details available at<br><br>http://store.lboro.ac.uk/browse/product.asp?compid=1&modid=5&catid=73<br><br>Please note that you will need to have attended an introductory day or a conference on dyscalculia either at Loughborough or elsewhere.
